name: Stellfire
description:
Physics based shooter with a variety of weapons which are obtainable through hidden artifacts, with multiple mechanics of their use.
Game has minimal UI and all key items that you pick are physically attached to the player
Different enemy types with different attacks
Loot spawn system and object interaction
Unique retro style look and graphical option with post processing toggles
Game build will be updated in the future, report any bug if you can, they will be fixed in appropriate time frame
